TEXT.P: What does this graph tell you about the growth of this laboratory population of yeast?
At the bottom left is a set of statements about the growth of this yeast population.
Click on the statement that you think best summarizes the trend shown by the graph.

As you consider these statements, look at the change in the number of cells for different time periods. What was the change in the number of cells between hours 6 and 7? How about between hours 15 and 16?
